body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Aaron Gonzales and the customer's name is Kathryn Hall.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Aaron Gonzales, and I represent Phat Hogs, your go-to motorcycle dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kathryn! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit frustrated because I've been having trouble with my motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that! Can you tell me what specific issues you're experiencing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It keeps stalling, and I think I might need to get it serviced.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. We can certainly help with that. May I have the model of your motorcycle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's a twenty twenty-one Fat Boy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Kathryn. Could you also provide me with your phone number? It will help us reach you easily.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two five four, one nine eight seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And lastly, could you confirm your address for us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three Elm Street, Springfield.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that, Kathryn. We will reach out to you shortly to schedule an appointment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time, Kathryn. Have a great day!
